role.argrole: thing arg0 hands down through singing it

example.parse: (IP (PP-LOC (P 在) (LCP (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 委婉))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 山歌) (NN 曲调) (NN 声))) (LC 中))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (NN 客家) (NN 文化)) (VP (DVP (VP (ADVP (AD 十分)) (VP (VA 自然))) (DEV 地)) (VP (VRD (VV 传唱) (VV 下去)))))
